episodes.description: The show introduces sporting spots in and around Tokyo where foreign travelers can easily visit during their stay. This time we present a bouldering gym at Akihabara, just 5 minutes from the station.
episodes.title: JAPAN SPORTSCOPE

episodes.description: The show introduces sporting spots in and around Tokyo where foreign travelers can easily visit during their stay. This time we present a skateboard-park in Tokyo within 30 minutes from Tokyo Station.
episodes.title: JAPAN SPORTSCOPE

episodes.description: This program introduces Japanese sports facilities for visitors from abroad. Our reporter visits spots which you can get to and back from Tokyo in a day. This time we show a Karate dojo in Kanagawa.
episodes.subtitle: KARATE
episodes.title: JAPAN SPORTSCOPE
